Description: Book of the Dead of Anhay; frame 4; full colour judgement vignette; blue border at top, yellow/red at bottom. The judgment of Anhay.
Curator's comments: Published: W. Seipel, Ägypten 1, Linz 1989, p.173 [139]. G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.15.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (14)
Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 121)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134517) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134517)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1989 Apr-Sep, Linz, Oberosterreichisches Landesmuseum, Götter-Gräber und die Kunst-4000 Jahre altäg Jenseitsglaube 1997 May, London, BBC TV Centre, Blue Peter broadcast 1997 13 Oct-1998 5 Jan, India, New Delhi, National Museum, The Enduring Image 1998 9 Feb-3 May, India, Mumbai, Sir Caswasjee Jahangir Hall, The Enduring Image 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
